name: Eclipse
description: Eclipse-Platform is a a core tool type when Eclipse runs. It includes many static methods used to obtain information on the operating system and Eclipse, such as the operating system architecture, extension point registration, Eclipse directory, etc.

en_US.description: Eclipse-Platform is a a core tool type when Eclipse runs. It includes many static methods used to obtain information on the operating system and Eclipse, such as the operating system architecture, extension point registration, Eclipse directory, etc.
en_US.name: Eclipse

zh_CN.description: Eclipse-Platform是Eclipse在运行时的一个核心工具类，包括很多静态方法用于获取操作系统和Eclipse相关信息，如操作系统架构、扩展点注册、Eclipse目录等。
zh_CN.name: Eclipse
